name: JulebrusCounter
shortDescription: A nextjs website for counting how much you drink during a period.
description: This project was made so that you can count how much julebrus you drink during a certain period or multiple, it does technicaly allow you to count up any drink you want as well.

name: Canthenos
shortDescription: Blazor website for viewing canteen data for a school. Project was made as a school assignment.

images.alt: Canthenos dashboard showcasing the todays dish and free breakfasts
Canthenos dashboard showcasing the available dishes

name: VotingSite
shortDescription: Voting website for voting on political parties in Norway, made with ASP.NET.
description:
This website was created due to a school project where the task was to make website where you could vote on different political parties that exists in Norway. The site had to connect to a database where the parties and voting information would be stored. The votes also had to be anonymous. Voters also should not be able to vote more than once, and can only vote for parties in the municipality that they belong to.

The project was created with ASP.NET Web Application (using .net framework) and Microsoft SQL Server.

images.alt: Votingsite home page showing results of votes and parties you can choose to vote on
Votingsite home page showing open dropdown of a selected party
Votingsite home page showing results of votes in form of a pie chart
